article:
The 'Direction' record label was a subsidiary label established by CBS Records
in the UK in spring 1967. It primarily released American soul and R&B recordings
in the UK, but also issued records by British and Jamaican artists. Among its
most successful releases were those by Sly & the Family Stone, The Bandwagon,
and The Chambers
Brothers. [http://www.georgwa.demon.co.uk/Direction%20records.htm Direction
label overview] [http://www.45cat.com/label/direction Direction label
discography at 45cat.com]
